function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Limitations in academic research on fm interventions for preventing respiratory infections","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Indoor respiratory virus transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of comprehensive fm interventions","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overlooked health-related building components","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to ineffective infection control measures in built environments","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited adoption of it-driven technologies in facility management domain","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ethical concerns related to capturing occupant information through sensors and cameras","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited effectiveness and safety of disinfection robots and uv systems","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertainty in handling laundry and waste disposal in hotels and other public facilities during a pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of research and guidelines for proper food handling and cleaning practices in preventing foodborne infections","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient hvac standards for diluting indoor air to prevent airborne pathogen transmission in high-occupancy facilities.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of evidence to assess the acceptability and feasibility of iaq interventions to key stakeholders.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Occupant behavior impacting indoor environment and disease transmission routes in buildings.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of understanding of occupant behaviors and their impact on disease transmission routes.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Psychological factors influencing occupant behaviors related to disease transmission.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Few risk calculators account for all three routes of transmission: fomite, airborne, and droplets, potentially underestimating the virus exposure dose for occupants.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited understanding of the integrated effects of solutions, such as whether different interventions are additive, multiplicative, or contradictory in their outcomes.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient investigation of the cost-effectiveness of various interventions and combinations, including ongoing maintenance costs, energy consumption, and impacts on the fm budget.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Respiratory virus transmission dynamics influenced by multiple architectural and environmental factors","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of cost-effectiveness and outcome studies in space management for infection control","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complexity of evaluating the risk of sars-cov-2 infection in indoor environments","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Routine disinfection timeframes not being followed for contacted surfaces and items","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Higher occupant density leading to increased physical contact and exposure to shared air","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of touchless operation technology for common office items and facilities","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of respiratory virus transmission via interior surfaces due to occupant hand-surface contact","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Airborne virus leakage from the drain due to poorly designed or maintained trap seal retention system.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of systematic guidance for drainage system operation and maintenance for infection control.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of respiratory viruses via contaminated indoor surfaces.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Airborne transmission risk due to traditional hvac systems","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Viral aerosols transmitted via building drainage system","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of upper-room uvgi system due to location and operation","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decline in upper-room uvgi systems efficiency with rising humidity levels","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of virus transmission through building heating systems","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate disinfection of indoor surfaces in vast open spaces and shadowed areas such as bedrails and telephones in a ward.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Concerns regarding occupants’ exposure to uv in upper-room uvgi systems.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence of upper-room uvgi system effectiveness on building parameters and system design.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential inefficacy of uvgi technology in disinfecting indoor air and surfaces","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited effectiveness of in-duct uvgi systems due to ventilation system efficiency and fan capacity","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Diminished ability of uvgi to disinfect indoor surfaces in the presence of dirt and debris","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Accumulation of pathogenic particles on ioniser and surrounding surfaces due to negative air ionisation","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of assessment and comparison of infection risk associated with lighting factors that reflect sunlight exposure","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient assessment of the effectiveness of uvgi systems in mitigating the spread of contagious diseases in healthcare settings","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Air pressure controls affected by air leaks","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Hazardous waste from filter disposal","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduction of airflow rate caused by filters","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Elevated indoor noise levels from pac operation","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective placement of pacs leading to uneven air purification and particle removal in the built environment.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective operation and maintenance of hepa filtration systems leading to reduced efficiency in particle removal and air purification.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Experimental studies with simulated aerosol particles in various indoor environments","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mixed effects of combining ventilation and pacs in buildings with central ventilation systems","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"}]}
